review_title: Needs a heavy hand for color to appear
review_content: I really wanted to love this. The color, coral sugar, looks great on the pan and swatched well on my hand. However, once I got it home to use it took a heavy hand for it to show on my cheeks and faded throughout the day. It’s possible that it lacked longevity because I wear thick sunscreen under my foundation but all the other brands I use ( Tarte / Nars ) have been tried and true.

review_content: This is a very pigmented pink that is great if used sparingly. It stays a long time and does not have any shimmer in it, so it’s a good everyday blush to brighten up your face if the rest of your makeup is subtle. A little goes a long way so I think this will last a long time.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: HG Blush and Always Will Be!
review_content:
Hands down, not only the best blush ever, also the best makeup product I own. I'm my 40s so I certainly don't need all kinds of shimmer to accentuate my fine lines. I appreciate that she has two types, for matte and shimmer based on the look you're trying to achieve. I bought this tiny product based on an employee's recommendation worried it was too little product and the color might be too bright. I wouldn't hesitate a moment if I were you... it lasts forever because it is very pigmented and the color is just spot on noticeable flush. It's actually "shortened" my morning routine because I'm now comfortable with the pigment and simply dip my brush and it's always perfect on both sides in less than a minute. I don't know about you, but I'd prefer that over layering to get the desired color. I've received many compliments over the years, also probably because my skin is so fair it's nearly clear, but be that what it may I have been using it faithfully for what feels like a decade. If you're hesitant due to the price vs. size, it's a non-issue. It lasts longer than any other blush I've had. Bobbi is indeed brilliant.

This product does not disappoint! I purposefully went in determined to buy this blush no matter what it looked like in the packaging because I've read such great reviews. I also didn't wear blush when I went to Sephora, and took my blush brush, so I could instantly apply it when I got in the car. First impression when seeing it in the packaging was WOW, that is some really bright pink blush!! I bought it anyway and was not disappointed. Like I said, as soon as I got in the car I applied it and was not disappointed one bit. This is my favorite blush I've ever tried. I do have NARS Orgasm and plan to still wear it for days when I'm just running errands. It doesn't go on flashing PINK, but really pretty. I know it's more pricy than most, but I suggest at least swatching it if you can so you can see how beautiful the color is before you say, "No," because it's so bright in the packaging. On your skin it's more subtle and beautiful.

I have been a furious blush hunt for the past couple weeks and finally decided to pull the trigger on this one. I am SO thrilled with this blush. The color pale pink does not disappoint and with my pale skin it looks glowing. I have yellowish undertones and usually go for red or peach blush, but this pink is amazing. A keeper!

Pale pink has been my go to blush since I was a freshman in high school (5 years ago). I love the color even though the formula has changed since I first purchased it. This is still my very favorite color for my cheeks.

I learned about pale pink from Michelle Money's YouTube, and despite being a makeup lover I am much more comfortable with a natural, I-woke-up-like-this, tanned kind of Jennifer Aniston, Gisele Bundchen look. The blue based pink gives my face a juicy, alive look, not a powdery, made-up one. I use a light hand no matter what product I use, and this blush has been the only one with any kind of punch. I range from NC25 to slightly darker when I self-tan, and it looks equally natural whether I'm pale or tan.

user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Skin Type Combination', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Eye Color Hazel']
review_title: Pale Pink-Deceiving in a Good Way
review_content:
I purchased the Bobbi Brown Blush in Pale Pink yesterday. If we're being completely honest I picked this one over the others because it's the blush that Catherine Duchess of Cambridge wore for her wedding day and her cheeks looked positively ravishing. To look at the blush in the packaging it looks VERY pink and an unnatural pink at that. However, I gave it the benefit of the doubt and tried it. This colour is exquisite, it perfectly mimics the colour my cheeks turn when I'm flushed or if they've been freshly pinched. It is very pigmented but blends with minimal effort as long as you have a nice fluffy brush. I've only had it on for about 5 hours at this point but it looks the exact same as when I put it on. This colour is very well suited for my fair skin but I could also see it working on other skin tones as well. I hope this is helpful to the other ladies (and gents) out there checking out Bobbi Brown!

If you're familiar with the consistency of Tarte blushes (which I also like), this is a bit of a softer consistency, so I find it a little easier to work with! Highly recommend for something easy that you don't have to really work with to make it look beautiful.

review_title: Longest lasting blush I've ever tried!
review_content: This is my second time buying one of these. I've tried so many high end blushes and this one is by far my favourite formula. The staying power is unreal! Blush is usually the first product to lose its staying power but not this one! Just buy it you won't regret it :) I have tawny and pretty pink, so pretty.

I've been dabbling in the world of high end blushes for a while now, and I was looking for a good pink color, so I thought I'd try this one. Now, I have a few "good" blushes...from Laura Mercier, Nars...but this BB blush. Holy Pigment, Batman! Which is good, a little goes a LOOOONG way. But I wish I'd known that before I did my usual, dip/tap/apply. You only need to barely touch the tinies tip of your brush into this blush to have plenty of pigment for your cheeks. Now that that's covered, the color is pretty and what it claims to be...a warm pink. It's pretty matte and is flattering on my fair, neutral to warm skin. Sure, it costs more and has less product, but it's ok because you don't need much product to get the desired effect...pretty pink cheeks. Definitely recommend. Give it a try.

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Skin Type Oily', 'Skin Tone Deep', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content: As usual Bobbi Brown makeup is simple, non-gimmicky, high quality and value-friendly. I bought this blush shade in "Flame" which looks intimidating in the pan. It's a fiery, bold red orange but with a light hand you can easily build the intensity of the shade. It's a universally flattering shade and lasts all day. Gorgeous color, chíc compact and tons of product in the pan.

I'm quite fair (NW18), and was somewhat intimidated when Pale Pink arrived. It looks so vibrant in the pan, but it is sheer enough that when applied other the cheeks it gives a prefect natural flush. The formula blends beautifully and doesn't kick up any powder when I dip my brush into it. I will definitely invest in more colors!
I've loved the blush forever!!! MY ABSOLUTE FAV!!!! I have fair combination skin but it works really well, blends nicely, and gives me a nice us kissed glow!!
I'm a huge fan of Bobbi Brown, and this little pan of magic did not disappoint. Super pigmented without being clown-like. Gorgeous, rich color. Absolutely in love!

user_specs: ['Skin Tone Light', 'Eye Color Blue']
review_content: My first product of Bobbi Brown. I bought the color "Pale Pink" and absolutely love it! Goes on nicely, lasts all day. A little goes a long way. However, it is a small portion for the price you pay especially since there is no brush or mirror provided. The packaging could be better. A little on the cheap side for the price. Otherwise it would be five stars.

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Skin Type Oily', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Eye Color Green']
review_title: Not Impressed or for those With a Heavy Hand
review_content:
I don't know why, but I purchased two different colors, similar to colors I have by benefit or Nars.....and thought the color is the same, they just don't look as good on my skin. Very pigmented, and perhaps it is because I have a heavy hand. I put a finishing oil free powder on over other blushes to blend them, and appear natural.....but it looks as if it's just sitting on top of these blushes. Short Story I prefer Nars blushes.

user_specs: ['Age 45-54', 'Skin Type Dry', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content: I probably picked the wrong color, but this is a very intense pigment. A little goes a LONG way.
I love that nude pink is matte and contains no shimmer at all, since sometimes that's hard to find. The blush is pigmented well. Overall good product- somewhat small container though!
I have it in Flame it's such a bright pigmented color! I love the dare look it gives your cheeks.
This is the perfect color for my face. It goes on nice and looks very natural. A little bit goes a long way.

user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Skin Type Normal', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content: The blush is very pigmented and seems to have a nice formula. I can't speak to the experience of it lasting a particularly long time since I didn't wear it for very long. I was not pleased with any of the shades, I thought they all looked horrible on me in store and the one I thought would look good I ended up having to return.
Lovely! Perfect amount of color payoff and it is difficult to be heavy handed so its great if you're scared of accidentally using too much blush!!!
Love this blush. Really wakes up my face. First time trying a BB blush and I went a little heave on the application the first day. This is very pigmented so a little goes a long way. Lasts all day.
These are very nice blushes a lil goes a long way. A lil powdery not to bad.

user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Eye Color Blue']
review_content: This blush is AMAZING. I have it in Pale Pink and it is the perfect bright cool pink. It makes me look alive and fresh, and has great staying power. I own several NARS blushes and actually prefer this one. There is such a beautiful range of pinks that if you need something warmer, you can definitely still find the perfect shade.

I love everything about this. The packaging is cute, the color (Nectar) is gorgeous, the matte finish and pigmentation is perfect and it stays on all day. I plan on purchasing more colors! I would definitely recommend this as an everyday blush:)

user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Skin Type Normal', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content: i was scared to buy this blush because it is so red, however it was perfect! I only have to use a little of the blush to achieve the perfect tone of blush i want.

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Skin Type Combination', 'Skin Tone Deep', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content: This blush is amazing. I didn't realize the impact blush could make until I used this one. When the sales associate recommended the color Flame to me, my first impression was that it was too bright. But I put it on and it looks great on dark skin tones. It's very buildable and one swipe on the brush is enough for the daytime. Would absolutely recommend and buy other colors too.
